channel.title: Deep Dive on DefinIT
channel.description: Recent content in Deep Dive on DefinIT

item.title: Book Review: VMware vSphere 6.5 Host Resources Deep Dive
item.description: The Host Resources Deep Dive book by Frank Denneman and Niels Hagoort has been one of the most widely anticipated books in the VMware community - previous deep dive books by Frank (co-authored with Duncan Epping), tantalising blog posts and captivating presentations have whet the appetite for the last year or so. Having sat through some of these presentations at VMUGs and VMworld I can tell you the depth and understanding that the authors bring to the table is immense.
